class PyDSS.pyPlots.pyPlotAbstract.PlotAbstract(PlotProperties, dssBuses, dssObjects, dssCircuit, dssSolver)[source]¶

An abstract class that serves as template for all pyPlot classes in PyDSS.pyPlots.Plots module.

Parameters

  • PlotProperties (dict) – A PyDSS.dssElement.dssElement object that wraps around an OpenDSS ‘Fault’ element

  • dssBuses (dict of PyDSS.dssBus.dssBus objects) – Dictionary of all PyDSS.dssBus.dssBus objects in PyDSS

  • dssObjects (dict of PyDSS.dssElement.dssElement objects) – Dictionary of all PyDSS.dssElement.dssElement objects in PyDSS

  • dssCircuit (dict of PyDSS.dssCircuit.dssCircuit objects) – Dictionary of all PyDSS.dssCircuit.dssCircuit objects in PyDSS

  • dssSolver (PyDSS.SolveMode) – An instance of one of the classes defined in PyDSS.SolveMode.

UpdatePlot()[source]¶

Method used to update the dynamic plots.

  • PlotProperties is a user defined dictionary genenated from the ‘pyPlotList.json’ file defined for each scenario. Excepted definations for each plot type are detailed below.

Frequency sweep plot¶

GIS plot¶

Histogram plot¶

Voltage sag plot¶

Time series plot¶

Voltage / Current heatmap plot¶

XY plots¶
